segment.source: How to Install the App-V Client by Using Setup.exe
segment.target: How to Install the App-V Client by Using Setup.exe

segment.source: How to Install the App-V Client by Using Setup.exe
segment.target: How to Install the App-V Client by Using Setup.exe

segment.source: How to Install the App-V Client by Using Setup.exe
segment.target: How to Install the App-V Client by Using Setup.exe

segment.source: This topic describes how to install the App-V client by using the setup.exe program.
segment.target: This topic describes how to install the App-V client by using the setup.exe program.

segment.source: When you install the App-V client using the setup.exe program, the installer determines which prerequisite software is needed and installs it automatically before it installs the client.
segment.target: When you install the App-V client using the setup.exe program, the installer determines which prerequisite software is needed and installs it automatically before it installs the client.

segment.source: To install the Application Virtualization Client by Using Setup.exe
segment.target: To install the Application Virtualization Client by Using Setup.exe

segment.source: Make sure you are logged on with an account that has administrator rights on the computer.
segment.target: Make sure you are logged on with an account that has administrator rights on the computer.

segment.source: Open a Command Prompt window, and then change the directory to the folder that contains the setup files.
segment.target: Open a Command Prompt window, and then change the directory to the folder that contains the setup files.

segment.source: When installing version 4.6 or a later version of the App-V client, you must use the correct installer for the computer’s operating system, 32-bit or 64-bit.
segment.target: When installing version 4.6 or a later version of the App-V client, you must use the correct installer for the computer’s operating system, 32-bit or 64-bit.

segment.source: The installation will fail and an error message will be displayed if you use the wrong installer.
segment.target: The installation will fail and an error message will be displayed if you use the wrong installer.

segment.source: Enter the install command string at the command prompt.
segment.target: Enter the install command string at the command prompt.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can create a command file and run it from the command prompt.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can create a command file and run it from the command prompt.

segment.source: You can also use a scripting language such as VBScript or Windows PowerShell to run the command.
segment.target: You can also use a scripting language such as VBScript or Windows PowerShell to run the command.

segment.source: The following command-line example shows how setup.exe can be used with a number of optional parameters.
segment.target: The following command-line example shows how setup.exe can be used with a number of optional parameters.

segment.source: For more information about these parameters, see Application Virtualization Client Installer Command-Line Parameters.
segment.target: For more information about these parameters, see Application Virtualization Client Installer Command-Line Parameters.

segment.source: "setup.exe" /s /v"/qn SWICACHESIZE="10240" SWIPUBSVRDISPLAY="Production System" SWIPUBSVRTYPE="HTTP /secure" SWIPUBSVRHOST="PRODSYS" SWIPUBSVRPORT="443" SWIPUBSVRPATH="/AppVirt/appsntype.xml" SWIPUBSVRREFRESH="on" SWIGLOBALDATA="D:AppVirtGlobal" SWIUSERDATA="^% LOCALAPPDATA ^%WindowsApplication Virtualization Client" SWIFSDRIVE="Q""
segment.target: "setup.exe" /s /v"/qn SWICACHESIZE="10240" SWIPUBSVRDISPLAY="Production System" SWIPUBSVRTYPE="HTTP /secure" SWIPUBSVRHOST="PRODSYS" SWIPUBSVRPORT="443" SWIPUBSVRPATH="/AppVirt/appsntype.xml" SWIPUBSVRREFRESH="on" SWIGLOBALDATA="D:AppVirtGlobal" SWIUSERDATA="^% LOCALAPPDATA ^%WindowsApplication Virtualization Client" SWIFSDRIVE="Q""

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The quotation marks that appear in the "/v" section must be treated as special characters and entered with a preceding "".
segment.target: The quotation marks that appear in the "/v" section must be treated as special characters and entered with a preceding "".

segment.source: The quotation marks are required only when the value contains a space; however, for consistency, all the instances in the preceding example are shown as having quotation marks.
segment.target: The quotation marks are required only when the value contains a space; however, for consistency, all the instances in the preceding example are shown as having quotation marks.

segment.source: The "" characters in "%HomeDrive%" must be preceded by the "" escape character.
segment.target: The "" characters in "%HomeDrive%" must be preceded by the "" escape character.

segment.source: Otherwise, the Windows command shell sets the value to that of the user who is performing the installation.
segment.target: Otherwise, the Windows command shell sets the value to that of the user who is performing the installation.

segment.source: The InstallShield switches /s and /qn are needed to make this a silent install.
segment.target: The InstallShield switches /s and /qn are needed to make this a silent install.

segment.source: The /qn switch must follow the /v switch, separated by only a quote character with no intervening spaces.
segment.target: The /qn switch must follow the /v switch, separated by only a quote character with no intervening spaces.

segment.source: The folder specified in the SWIGLOBALDATA value must already exist.
segment.target: The folder specified in the SWIGLOBALDATA value must already exist.

segment.source: When the installation is complete, we recommend that you run a Microsoft Update scan to ensure the latest updates are installed.
segment.target: When the installation is complete, we recommend that you run a Microsoft Update scan to ensure the latest updates are installed.

segment.target: Related topics
